get_cond_probas¶

smote_likes.distance_metrics.get_cond_probas(X: numpy.ndarray, target: numpy.ndarray) → list[source]¶

Get a list of all conditional probabilities in each column of X

Parameters

  • X (numpy.ndarray) – The feature matrix with dimensions (observations, features).

  • target (numpy.ndarray) – The target class for each row in X.

Returns

list – Each entry contains the conditional probability \(P_{a,x,c}\) in a dictionary with following structure:

target value -> attribute value -> attribute count
